channel.title: CVE Feed for tyxla -- Gravity Forms: Multiple Form Instances
channel.description: The latest CVEs for tyxla -- Gravity Forms: Multiple Form Instances

item.title: CVE-2024-6550|2024-07-10T03:32:35.140Z -- tyxla -- gravity%20forms%3A%20multiple%20form%20instances
item.description: The Gravity Forms: Multiple Form Instances plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Full Path Disclosure in all versions up to, and including, 1.1.1. This is due to the plugin leaving test files with display_errors on. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to retrieve the full path of the web application, which can be used to aid other attacks. The information displayed is not useful on its own, and requires another vulnerability to be present for damage to an affected website.
